title: Muteki Robo Trider G7 (Invincible Robo Trider G7)
synopsis: Takeo Watta inherits a company upon his father's death. The company focuses on space travel, and the transformable robot Trider-G7 is their greatest creation. When an evil space organization lead by Lord Zakuron starts attacking Earth, Watta has to use Trider in a more combat-oriented way.
voices: ['Majima, Satomi', 'Akimoto, Chikako', 'Ogata, Kenichi', 'Takiguchi, Junpei', 'Wakamoto, Norio', 'Mutou, Reiko', 'Sawa, Ritsuo', 'Matsuoka, Fumio', 'Sasaoka, Shigezou', 'Chiba, Shigeru']
